verses.text: \w Bel|strong="H1078"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* broken, \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* destroyed: \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w are|strong="H6091"\w* put \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w and|strong="H0929"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, \w your|strong="H1961"\w* burdens \w of|strong="H0929"\w* heavy weight even unto weariness.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* consumed, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* broken \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w him|strong="H3766"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w carried|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.

Hearken unto \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* bowels, \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w old|strong="H7872"\w* \w age|strong="H7872"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* grey \w hairs|strong="H7872"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*, \w and|strong="H5375"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H5375"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w*.

\w To|strong="H1819"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* have you likened \w me|strong="H1819"\w*, and made \w me|strong="H1819"\w* \w equal|strong="H1819"\w*, and \w compared|strong="H1819"\w* \w me|strong="H1819"\w*, and made \w me|strong="H1819"\w* \w like|strong="H1819"\w*?

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3701"\w* contribute \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w out|strong="H8254"\w* \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w bag|strong="H3599"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w weigh|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H8254"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* scales: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w hire|strong="H7936"\w* \w a|strong="H8254"\w* \w goldsmith|strong="H6884"\w* \w to|strong="H3701"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H8254"\w* \w god|strong="H0410"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w fall|strong="H5456"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* piece, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* stir \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. Yea, \w when|strong="H5375"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w also|strong="H0637"\w* unto \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hear: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* tribulation.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* ashamed: \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, ye \w transgressors|strong="H6586"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* age, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* beside, \w neither|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w me|strong="H3644"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* shew \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w last|strong="H0319"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* ancient times \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*:

\w Who|strong="H0376"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w bird|strong="H5861"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*: \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w created|strong="H3335"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*. Hear \w me|strong="H0935"\w*, O ye hardhearted, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* justice.

\w I|strong="H7350"\w* \w have|strong="H8085"\w* brought \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* near, \w it|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* not \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* salvation \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* not tarry. \w I|strong="H7350"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* salvation \w in|strong="H0413"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* glory \w in|strong="H0413"\w* Israel.
